description: Implemented a technical and business monitoring dashboard for automation projects to reduce human contact.
Followed project life cycle from gathering user requirements, creating timelines to implementing and evaluating.
Analyzed and optimized automation workflows, delivering actionable recommendations for process improvements.
Developed Python test scripts to support migration from Power Automate and UiPath, enhancing system reliability.
Extended the internal material Power Apps platform to support mobile borrowing and returning via bar code scanning.

Performed in-depth user research, crafted user journey, optimized user experience flow and created captivating Figma prototype for a landlord CRM system startup, winning seed funding from Cyberport University Partnership Program.
Led a team of 4 developers to implement the solution, employing a ReactJS mobile application and a LINE chatbot.
Monitored backend performance in 10 MTR substations and adjusted Gantt chart timelines for a 2-year project.
Performed software migration from Perl to Python as Digital Development Center's initiative to ensure maintainability.
Conducted testing and replacement utilizing AutoCAD, and streamlined Excel document handling with Python scripts.
Developed a dashboard using Adobe Analytics to provide insights on homepage banner performance and created a user segmentation analysis, uncovering insights to enhance marketing strategies.
Applied machine learning models to evaluate users' likelihood of becoming AIA customers, achieving an 89% F-1 score.
Directed the redesign and development of a dynamic WordPress site, prioritizing usability enhancements in the design phase and crafting custom PHP plugins to elevate functionality during development.
